speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Defining moments in life come often and unexpectedly, even when you are still young. Allow me to share a story about a high school student, Kevin, chosen to travel out of state for a student leader event, as told in his own words.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “My turn in line came, and the official-looking registration clerk asked for my name. She looked at her list and said, ‘So you’re the young man from Utah.’

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘You mean I’m the only one?’ I asked.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘Yes, the only one.’ She handed me my name tag with ‘Utah’ printed below my name. As I clipped it on, I felt like I was being branded.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I crowded into the hotel elevator with five other high school students with name tags like mine. ‘Hey, you’re from Utah. Are you a Mormon?’ asked one student.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I felt out of place with all these student leaders from all over the country. ‘Yes,’ I hesitantly admitted.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘You’re the guys who believe in Joseph Smith, who said he saw angels. You don’t actually believe that, do you?’

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I didn’t know what to say. The students in the elevator were all staring at me. I had just arrived, and already everyone thought I was different. I became a little defensive but then said, ‘I know that Joseph Smith was a prophet of God.’

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘Where had that come from?’ I wondered. I didn’t know I had it in me. But the words felt true.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘Yeah, I was told that you were all just religious nuts,’ he said.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “With that, there was an uncomfortable pause as the elevator door opened. As we gathered our luggage, he walked down the hall laughing.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “Then, a voice behind me asked, ‘Hey, don’t Mormons have some sort of another Bible?’

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “Oh no. Not again. I turned to see another student who had been in the elevator with me, Christopher.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘It’s called the Book of Mormon,’ I said, wanting to drop the subject. I picked up my bags and started walking down the hall.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘Is that the book Joseph Smith translated?’ he asked.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘Yeah, it is,’ I answered. I kept on walking, hoping to avoid embarrassment.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “‘Well, do you know how I could get one?’

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “A scripture I learned in seminary suddenly came to me. ‘I am not ashamed of the gospel of Jesus Christ.’ 1 As this entered my mind, I felt ashamed I had been so embarrassed.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “For the rest of the week that scripture wouldn’t leave me. I answered as many questions about the Church as I could, and I made many friends.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I discovered I was proud of my religion.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I gave Christopher a Book of Mormon. He later wrote me, telling me he had invited the missionaries to his home.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I learned not to be embarrassed to share my testimony.” 2

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: I am inspired by Kevin’s courage in sharing his testimony. It is a courage repeated every day by faithful members of the Church throughout the world. As I share my thoughts, I invite you to reflect upon these four questions:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Do I know and understand what a testimony is?

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Do I know how to bear my testimony?

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: What are the obstacles in sharing my testimony?

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: How do I keep my testimony?

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Your testimony is a most precious possession, often associated with deep spiritual feelings. These feelings are usually communicated quietly and described as a “still small voice.” 3 It is your belief or knowledge of truth given as a spiritual witness through the influence of the Holy Ghost. Acquiring this witness will change what you say and how you act. Key elements of your testimony, confirmed by the Holy Ghost, include:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: God is your Heavenly Father; you are His child. He loves you.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Jesus Christ lives. He is the Son of the living God and your Savior and Redeemer.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Joseph Smith is a prophet of God called to restore the Church of Jesus Christ.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is God’s restored Church on the earth.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: The restored Church of Jesus Christ is led by a living prophet today.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: You bear your testimony when you share spiritual feelings with others. As a member of the Church, you have opportunities to bear your spoken testimony in formal Church meetings or in less formal, one-on-one conversations with family, friends, and others.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Another way you share your testimony is through righteous behavior. Your testimony in Jesus Christ isn’t just what you say—it’s who you are.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Each time you bear vocal witness or demonstrate through your actions your commitment to follow Jesus Christ, you invite others to “come unto Christ.” 4

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Members of the Church stand as witnesses of God at all times, in all things, and in all places. 5 Opportunities to do this in the digital universe using inspiring content of our own or sharing uplifting content prepared by others are endless. We testify when we love, share, and invite, even online. Your tweets, direct messages, and posts will take on a higher, holier purpose when you also use social media to show how the gospel of Jesus Christ shapes your life.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Obstacles to sharing your testimony may include uncertainty about what to say. Matthew Cowley, an early Apostle, shared this experience as he departed on a five-year mission at age 17 to New Zealand:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I will never forget the prayers of my father the day that I left. I have never heard a more beautiful blessing in all my life. Then his last words to me at the railroad station, ‘My boy, you will go out on that mission; you will study; you will try to prepare your sermons; and sometimes when you are called upon, you will think you are wonderfully prepared, but when you stand up, your mind will go completely blank.’ I have had that experience more than once.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “I said, ‘What do you do when your mind goes blank?’

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “He said, ‘You stand up there and with all the fervor of your soul, you bear witness that Joseph Smith was a prophet of the living God, and thoughts will flood into your mind and words to your mouth … to the heart of everyone who listens.’ And so my mind, being mostly blank during my … mission … , gave me the opportunity to bear testimony to the greatest event in the history of the world since the crucifixion of the Master. Try it sometime, fellows and girls. If you don’t have anything else to say, testify that Joseph Smith was the prophet of God, and the whole history of the Church will flood into your mind.” 6

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Likewise, President Dallin H. Oaks shared, “Some testimonies are better gained on the feet bearing them than on the knees praying for them.” 7 The Spirit bears witness to the speaker and listener alike.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Another obstacle, as Kevin’s story emphasized, is fear. As Paul wrote to Timothy:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love. …

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord.” 8

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Feelings of fear don’t come from the Lord but most often from the adversary. Having faith, as Kevin did, will allow you to overcome these feelings and freely share what is in your heart.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: I believe a testimony is innate within us, yet, in order to keep it and more fully develop it, Alma taught that we must nourish our testimony with much care. 9 As we do so, “it will get root, and grow up, and bring forth fruit.” 10 Without this, “it withers away.” 11

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Each beloved member of the First Presidency has provided us with direction on how to keep a testimony.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: President Henry B. Eyring lovingly taught us that “feasting on the word of God, heartfelt prayer, and obedience to the Lord’s commandments must be applied evenly and continually for your testimony to grow and prosper.” 12

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: President Dallin H. Oaks reminded us that to retain our testimony, “we need to partake of the sacrament each week (see D&C 59:9 ) to qualify for the precious promise that we will ‘always have his Spirit to be with [us]’ ( D&C 20:77 ).” 13

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: And President Russell M. Nelson kindly counseled recently:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “Feed [your testimony] truth. …

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “… Nourish yourself in the words of ancient and modern prophets. Ask the Lord to teach you how to hear Him better. Spend more time in the temple and in family history work.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “… Make your testimony your highest priority.” 14

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: My beloved brothers and sisters, I promise that as you more fully understand what a testimony is, and as you share it, you will overcome obstacles of uncertainty and fear, enabling you to nurture and keep this most precious possession, your testimony.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: We are blessed to have countless examples of ancient and modern-day prophets who have boldly borne their testimonies.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Following Christ’s death, Peter stood and testified:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “Be it known unto you all … that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, whom ye crucified, whom God raised from the dead, … doth this man stand here before you. …

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “… For there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.” 15

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Amulek, following Alma’s sermon on faith, stated powerfully: “I will testify unto you of myself that these things are true. Behold, I say unto you, that I do know that Christ shall come among the children of men, … and that he shall atone for the sins of the world; for the Lord God hath spoken it.” 16

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Joseph Smith and Sidney Rigdon, upon witnessing a glorious vision of the resurrected Savior, testified:

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “And now, after the many testimonies which have been given of him, this is the testimony, last of all, which we give of him: That he lives!

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: “For we saw him, even on the right hand of God; and we heard the voice bearing record that he is the Only Begotten of the Father.” 17

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, I invite you to seek opportunities to bear your testimony in word and in deed. Such an opportunity came to me recently, at the end of a meeting with the mayor of a capital city in South America, in his chambers with a number of his cabinet officials. As we concluded with very cordial feelings, I hesitantly thought I should share my testimony. Following the prompting, I offered a witness that Jesus Christ is the Son of the living God and the Savior of the world. Everything changed at that moment. The Spirit in the room was undeniable. It seemed everyone was touched. “The Comforter … beareth record of the Father and of the Son.” 18 I am so grateful I summoned the courage to bear my testimony.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: When a moment like this comes, grab it and embrace it. You will feel the warmth of the Comforter inside you when you do.

speaker: Elder Gary E. Stevenson
role: Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles
title: Nourishing and Bearing Your Testimony
paragraph_text: I offer my testimony and witness to you—God is our Heavenly Father, Jesus Christ lives, and The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is God’s Church on the earth today led by our dear prophet, President Russell M. Nelson. In the name of Jesus Christ, amen.
